TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit TableLayoutStyleCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList
Public MustInherit Class TableLayoutStyleCollection Implements IList
public ref class TableLayoutStyleCollection abstract : System::Collections::IList
type TableLayoutStyleCollection = class interface IList interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 实现表布局样式集合的基本功能。

span.span: Implements the basic functionality for a collection of table layout styles.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类表示用于描述列或行中关联的所有样式的集合。The class represents the collection of all the styles used to describe the columns or rows in an associated . 类派生自专用，如下所示：Classes derived from are specialized as follows: - 一个聚合为一系列的列样式对象。A aggregates column styles as a collection of objects. - 一个聚合作为一系列行样式对象。A aggregates row styles as a collection of objects. 成员的大多数都是实现的。Most of the members of are implementations of .

Public Function Add (style As TableLayoutStyle) As Integer

summary.span: 在当前集合的末尾添加一个新的 。

span.span: Adds a new to the end of the current collection.
The position into which the new element was inserted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将重新应用到所有的控件中当前表布局容器。The method reapplies the table layout to all the controls in the current container. 存储在集合中的样式数量仅受可用内存。The number of styles stored in a collection is limited only by available memory.

abstract member Clear : unit -> unit override this.Clear : unit -> unit

summary.span: 断开集合与关联的 之间的关联，并清空该集合。

span.span: Disassociates the collection from its associated and empties the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不能重写此方法。This method cannot be overridden. 方法将执行两个主要操作：The method performs two main actions: - 取消关联当前从其容器，以便这些样式是不能应用于包含在面板内的控件的布局。It disassociates the current from its container so that the styles are no longer applied to the layout of the controls contained within the panel. 因此，重新应用表布局面板中的所有控件。As a result, the table layout is reapplied to all the controls in the panel. - 清空所有的集合及其对象。It empties the collection of all of its objects. 因此，属性设置为 0。As a result, the property is set to 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只有其中一个的派生类型，或，可以存储在。Only one of the derived types, or , can be stored in a . 一种样式的实例可以是仅与单个容器相关联。An instance of a style can be associated only with a single container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不能重写此方法。This method cannot be overridden. 之前已删除，它会与其其容器。Before the is removed, it is disassociated from its container. 因此，重新应用表布局面板中的所有控件。As a result, the table layout is reapplied to all the controls in the panel.
